_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Qualities of a person who should not be: They don’t know if a lodging has been assigned or not
Qualities of a person who should be appo: They know if a lodging has been assigned or not
Qualities of a person who should not be: They don’t know if a lodging has been allocated or not
Qualities of a person who should be appo: They know if a lodging has been allocated or not
Qualities of a person who should not be: They don’t know if stores are protected or not
Qualities of a person who should be appo: They know if stores are protected or not
Qualities of a supervisor of novices [an: They don’t make decisions prejudiced by favoritism
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by hostility
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by stupidity
They don’t make decisions prejudiced by cowardice
They know if a novice has been supervised or not
